title: More robust logic needed for disk sorting with border value rows
description: When sorting on disk, if there are 40,000 rows of data and the program is configured to process only a fraction of the data (e.g., less than 40,000), the current logic fails to handle the sorting properly.
OB: Currently, when sorting on disk, if the program is configured to process less than 40,000 rows of data, the sorting operation does not work as expected.
